SELECT r.id AS 'goodsPriceRatioId', r.ratio, r.create_by AS 'createBy.id', (select u.name from trains.sys_user u where u.id = r.create_by) AS 'createBy.name', r.create_date AS 'createDate', r.update_by AS 'updateBy.id', r.update_date AS 'updateDate', r.del_flag AS 'delflag' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_price_ratio r LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods_price_ratio_details d ON d.ratio_id = r.id WHERE r.del_flag = 0
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{cityIds},d.city_ids)
AND r.ratio >= #{minRatio} AND r.ratio <= #{maxRatio}
GROUP BY r.id

SELECT d.ratio_id AS 'goodsPriceRatioId', GROUP_CONCAT(d.goods_id) AS 'goodsIds', GROUP_CONCAT(g.goods_name) AS 'goodsNames', d.city_ids AS 'cityIds', d.city_names AS 'cityNames', d.ratio, d.del_flag AS 'delflag' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_price_ratio_details d LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = d.goods_id WHERE d.ratio_id = #{goodsPriceRatioId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_goods_price_ratio( ratio, create_by, create_date, del_flag )VALUES( #{ratio}, #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_goods_price_ratio SET ratio = #{ratio}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE id = #{goodsPriceRatioId}
